author: hahnjo
body: It seems that gcc10 miscompiles (some of) the VecGeom code at `-O3`. In my tests, switching back to `-O2` fixes the crashes. More details and discussion if that is indeed a compiler problem or an issue in the code in https://sft.its.cern.ch/jira/projects/VECGEOM/issues/VECGEOM-600
title: Disable aggressive compiler optimizations for VecGeom
